events.message: I am filing a claim for an accident involving my car that happened yesterday in the city center during heavy traffic.
The claim has been reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to a vehicle collision that caused significant damage.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to assist with the processing and investigation of your vehicle accident.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim and understand the urgency caused by your recent car collision; we will expedite the process.
Please provide photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and your driverâ€™s license to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents, including police report and photographs of the collision damage, have been submitted for review.
The investigation into the car accident circumstances, vehicle damage, and third-party liability has begun with our specialists.
Investigation completed successfully, confirming the other driver was at fault and damage aligns with their collision report.
A settlement proposal covering repairs to your vehicle and compensation for rental car expenses has been prepared and sent.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer, appreciating the prompt handling and clear communication throughout.
Your auto accident claim has been officially approved, and all coverage limits for the damages will be applied as agreed.
Payment covering approved repair costs and rental reimbursement has been issued to your bank account today.
Your claim is now closed with all funds paid out and vehicle repairs confirmed complete by the service center.
